column3: Estrild of the Shiokaze Hostelry remains unwavering in keeping a close, enlisting eye on passersby.
So good to see you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. There is news I've been waiting to share with you.
It's that damnable Wlveva. She had the gall to chastise me for inviting passersby to join Clan Centurio. All I ever sought was to bring the thrill of the Hunt to all who cared to know it.
I grant you, no soul save you that I've recruited has ever reported back from their outings. We assume them all fallen. But such is the nature of the Hunt.

I've neither time nor patience for the weak. Let the Hunt cull them from our ranks, I say. If a hundred must die for Clan Centurio to find one such as you, so be it. Aye, I knew you to be of great ability. But never did I suspect you would climb so high.
You've done good by me, and made me proud to call you <If(PlayerParameter(4))>sister<Else/>brother</If>. From this day forth, I recognize you as one of Clan Centurio's most accomplished hunters.

With that, you have the Clan's leave to hunt the Far East's most fearsome quarry. I hazard you require no long-winded explanation, having already faced such beasts in Ishgard. Still, for sake of ceremony, go and speak with Wlveva.
Go well, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. And don't go dying on me now─the true fun has only just begun.
Hail, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I have had word from Estrild. It seems she has vouched for your promotion to Clan Centurio's elite.
I agree, you have proven yourself. There is nary a soul in the Clan who doubts your ability.

Be welcome to our highest rank, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>sister<Else/>brother</If>. We wish you good fortune on your future hunts. And you will need it, for now you hunt the fiercest prey the Far East has to offer.
On these hunts, we grade our quarry according to its strength. The higher the grade, the greater the bounty. But, of course, so too the greater the danger.

Never has Estrild thought so highly of one of her recruits. You have come far. So far, any further words of warning may be meaningless, but I will give them all the same. Now more than ever, do not overestimate yourself.
You are now able to undertake elite Veteran Clan mark bills from the Clan Hunt boards in Kugane and Rhalgr's Reach.
You and I are bonded by the Clan, my <If(PlayerParameter(4))>sister<Else/>brother</If> of the Hunt. I'll not suffer you to die lightly now. Go and speak with Wlveva. The Hunt calls!
